---@class buffBase
local buffBase = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function buffBase:initialize()
   self._buffTimeType = Enum_Battle.BuffTimeType.once
   self._lastValue = 0
   self._level = 1
end

function buffBase:onStart()

end

function buffBase:onEnd()

end
--- 每帧调用
function buffBase:onUpDate()

end
--- 每秒调用
function buffBase:onUpDate_sec()

end

function buffBase:soundMsg()
  return {}
end
--- overwrite
function buffBase:onSoundValueChange()

end
--- 设置数值
function buffBase:setNumeric()

end
--- 叠加层级
function buffBase:upLevel(level)
    level = level or 1
    self._level = self._level + level
end
return buffBase
